JesusFreke/lalboard

3D-printed keyboard inspired by DataHand

Related repos

  • Handheld Linux computer with tactile keyboard
  • Android keyboard using swipes on a 3x3 grid
  • turn a key photo into a 3D printable model
  • Prints handouts and character sheets on thermal printers
  • Keyboard without internet permission for privacy
  • practice touch typing and boost speed

  • Simulates lighting effects on MacBook keyboards via virtual HID devices
